GitHubApiData.name: ThinkSound
GitHubApiData.description: [NeurIPS 2025] PyTorch implementation of [ThinkSound], a unified framework for generating audio from any modality, guided by Chain-of-Thought (CoT) reasoning.

TranslatedDescriptions.zh-CN: [NeurIPS 2025] [ThinkSound] 的 PyTorch 实现，一个统一的框架，可通过链式思维（CoT）推理从任意模态生成音频。
TranslatedDescriptions.zh-TW: 【NeurIPS 2025】[ThinkSound] 的 PyTorch 實作，一個統一框架，可從任意模態生成音訊，並以 Chain-of-Thought（CoT）推理引導。
TranslatedDescriptions.ja: [NeurIPS 2025] [ThinkSound] の PyTorch 実装。Chain-of-Thought（CoT）推論によって導かれる、あらゆるモダリティから音声を生成する統一フレームワーク。
TranslatedDescriptions.ko: [NeurIPS 2025] [ThinkSound]의 PyTorch 구현입니다. Chain-of-Thought(CoT) 추론을 기반으로 모든 모달리티에서 오디오를 생성하는 통합 프레임워크입니다.
TranslatedDescriptions.hi: [NeurIPS 2025] [ThinkSound] का PyTorch इम्प्लीमेंटेशन, जो किसी भी मोडैलिटी से ऑडियो जनरेट करने के लिए एक एकीकृत फ्रेमवर्क है, जिसे Chain-of-Thought (CoT) रीजनिंग द्वारा निर्देशित किया गया है।
TranslatedDescriptions.th: [NeurIPS 2025] การใช้งาน PyTorch ของ [ThinkSound] ซึ่งเป็นกรอบการทำงานแบบรวมสำหรับสร้างเสียงจากทุกโมดาลิตี้ โดยมีการชี้นำด้วยการให้เหตุผลแบบ Chain-of-Thought (CoT)
TranslatedDescriptions.en: [NeurIPS 2025] PyTorch implementation of [ThinkSound], a unified framework for generating audio from any modality, guided by Chain-of-Thought (CoT) reasoning.
TranslatedDescriptions.fr: [NeurIPS 2025] Implémentation PyTorch de [ThinkSound], un cadre unifié pour générer de l’audio à partir de n’importe quelle modalité, guidé par le raisonnement Chain-of-Thought (CoT).
TranslatedDescriptions.de: [NeurIPS 2025] PyTorch-Implementierung von [ThinkSound], einem einheitlichen Framework zur Generierung von Audio aus beliebigen Modalitäten, gesteuert durch Chain-of-Thought (CoT)-Reasoning.
TranslatedDescriptions.es: [NeurIPS 2025] Implementación en PyTorch de [ThinkSound], un marco unificado para generar audio a partir de cualquier modalidad, guiado por razonamiento Chain-of-Thought (CoT).
TranslatedDescriptions.it: [NeurIPS 2025] Implementazione PyTorch di [ThinkSound], un framework unificato per generare audio da qualsiasi modalità, guidato dal ragionamento Chain-of-Thought (CoT).
TranslatedDescriptions.ru: [NeurIPS 2025] Реализация [ThinkSound] на PyTorch — унифицированный фреймворк для генерации аудио из любой модальности с использованием рассуждений Chain-of-Thought (CoT).
TranslatedDescriptions.pt: [NeurIPS 2025] Implementação em PyTorch do [ThinkSound], uma estrutura unificada para geração de áudio a partir de qualquer modalidade, guiada por raciocínio Chain-of-Thought (CoT).
TranslatedDescriptions.nl: [NeurIPS 2025] PyTorch-implementatie van [ThinkSound], een uniform framework voor het genereren van audio vanuit elke modaliteit, gestuurd door Chain-of-Thought (CoT) redeneren.
TranslatedDescriptions.pl: [NeurIPS 2025] Implementacja PyTorch [ThinkSound], zunifikowanego frameworka do generowania dźwięku z dowolnej modalności, wspieranego rozumowaniem Chain-of-Thought (CoT).
TranslatedDescriptions.ar: [NeurIPS 2025] تنفيذ PyTorch لإطار العمل [ThinkSound]، وهو إطار موحد لتوليد الصوت من أي نوع بيانات، موجّه بواسطة التفكير المتسلسل (Chain-of-Thought - CoT).
TranslatedDescriptions.tr: [NeurIPS 2025] [ThinkSound] için PyTorch uygulaması: Herhangi bir modaliteden ses üretimi için Zincirleme Düşünce (CoT) mantığıyla yönlendirilen birleşik bir çerçeve.
TranslatedDescriptions.fa: [NeurIPS 2025] پیاده‌سازی PyTorch از [ThinkSound]، یک چارچوب یکپارچه برای تولید صدا از هر نوع داده (مدالیتی)، با راهنمایی استدلال زنجیره‌ای (Chain-of-Thought یا CoT).
TranslatedDescriptions.vi: [NeurIPS 2025] Triển khai PyTorch của [ThinkSound], một khung thống nhất để tạo âm thanh từ bất kỳ dạng dữ liệu nào, được dẫn dắt bởi phương pháp suy luận Chuỗi Tư Duy (Chain-of-Thought - CoT).
TranslatedDescriptions.id: [NeurIPS 2025] Implementasi PyTorch dari [ThinkSound], sebuah kerangka kerja terpadu untuk menghasilkan audio dari berbagai modalitas, dipandu oleh penalaran Chain-of-Thought (CoT).
TranslatedDescriptions.as: [NeurIPS 2025] [ThinkSound]-ৰ PyTorch ৰূপান্তৰ, যি এটা একত্ৰিত ফ্ৰেমৱৰ্ক যি যিকোনো মডেলিটিৰ পৰা অডিঅ' সৃষ্টি কৰিব পাৰে, Chain-of-Thought (CoT) reasoning-এ পথপ্ৰদৰ্শিত।
